a_t06_g10_03:
Huh? A secret menu item? Sorry, I don’t know
anything about that...
a_t06_g10_04:
I hear it said that there’s some kind of amazing
gimmick in the Treasure Eatery.
a_t06_g10_17:
Well, I’ll be! I don’t think I’ve ever had grub
as good as this!
a_t06_g10_18:
I heard rumors that you can change your
Pokémon’s Tera Type here.\c
Turns out the food’s pretty good, too.
